title: Technology Integration and Assessment Strategies for Female Faculty: CMC-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics curriculum knowledge and basic project management experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes collaborative learning environments using digital devices, highlighting active learner interaction and relationship-building.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three relationship-centered communication strategies when designing student-engaged mathematics projects using CMC tools.
Learners can develop a rubric to evaluate the knowledge construction process in online collaborative environments and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners can recognize power balance issues when designing technology-based instruction and propose democratic assessment approaches centered on learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
